opis: Na prodaju obiteljska kuća stambene površine 240 m2, funkcionalnog tlocrta, na dobroj lokaciji i položaju te u blizini svih bitnih sadržaja za život nadomak Kutine. Predmetna kuća sastoji se od: PRIZEMLJE - jednosoban novouređen stan, poslovni prostor ( također može biti jednosoban stan) te velika  garaža sa dodatnim spremištem. KAT -  trosoban stan: ulazni hodnik, kupaonica, kuhinja s blagovaonom (izlaz na balkon), dnevni boravak,  dvije sobe od koje jedna ima izlaz na balkon.. POTKROVLJE: dvije velike sobe, hodnik i izba. U dvorištu se također nalazi pecara i dodatno spremište te veliki parking. Priključci: struja, gradski vodovod, plin te bunar. Kuća je u cijelosti adaptirana 2010. Uredno vlasništvo kao i sva dokumentacija, kuća posjeduje građevinsku i uporabnu dozvolu te je sve legalizirano. Za dodatne informacije slobodno nas kontaktirajte: LUMA Nekretnine Email: info@luma-nekretnine.hr Mob: +385 98 530 622 Vedran Klopček,bacc.oec - licencirani agent ____________________________________________ For sale, a family house with a living area of ​​240 m2, a functional floor plan, in a good location and position, and close to all essential facilities for life, close to Kutina. The subject house consists of: GROUND FLOOR - one-bedroom apartment, office space (it can also be a one-bedroom apartment) and a large garage with additional storage. FLOOR - three-room apartment: entrance hall, bathroom, kitchen with dining room (exit to the balcony), living room, two rooms, one of which has an exit to the balcony. BASEMENT: two large rooms, hallway and room. In the yard there is also an additional storage room, as well as a large parking lot. Connections: electricity, city water supply, gas... The house was completely renovated in 2010. Proper ownership as well as all documentation, the house has a construction and use permit and everything is legalized. For additional information, please contact us: LUMA Real Estate Email: info@luma-nekretnine.hr Mobile: +385 98 530 622 – Vedran Klopček
